english.segment1: Where am I. Someone please turn on the lights. Im not fine Im not fine. How can I find my way from this little cellar they call life
english.segment2: Down here I tear out my veins and tie them to the chair. This goes on and on and on. Unravelled in contortions I run for the door. This goes on and on and on
english.segment3: Hold on, hold on, hold on to my own destruction. I fall face first, I fall face first. Watch me descend Im on display. This cycle of human decay
english.segment4: I feel it lurking in the corners. I watch it tracking up my arm
english.segment5: I am the anchor. I am the anchor. I am the anchor. Bound to my existence. Bound to my existence
english.segment6: I make peace with the parasites I live among. Paralyzed I watch them colonize as I sit here and just fall apart
english.segment7: The beggars and choosers are all the same. The default reaction will never change. So I catch a glimpse of my own reflection. From a shard of glass left on the floor
english.segment8: The beggars and choosers are all the same. The default reaction will never change
english.segment9: Its time to restart. Reassemble whats left of my body. Its time to restart. Pick me up and walk away
english.segment10: Uproot the anchor. Uproot the anchor. Uproot the anchor. Uproot the anchor
english.segment12: Ill change for the better. It cant get much worse. Ill swallow my own pride. And then accept defeat
